OS.question: Which process can be affected by other processes executing in the system?
When several processes access the same data concurrently and the outcome of the execution depends on the particular order in which the access takes place, is called?
If a process is executing in its critical section, then no other processes can be executing in their critical section. This condition is called?
Which of the following is a synchronisation tool?
A semaphore  is a shared integer variable_____
OS.a: that can not drop below zero
OS.b: that can not be more than zero
OS.c: that can not drop below one
OS.d: that can not be more than one

OS.question: Mutual exclusion can be provided by the ____________
OS.c: both mutex locks and binary semaphores

CN.question: When collection of various computers seems a single coherent system to its client, then it is called ________
Two devices are in network if __________
CN.a: a process in one device is able to exchange information with a process in another device
CN.b: a process is running on both devices
CN.c: PIDs of the processes running of different devices are same
CN.d: a process is active and another is inactive

CN.question: Which of the following computer networks is built on the top of another network?
In computer network nodes are _________
CN.a: the computer that originates the data
CN.b: the computer that routes the data
CN.c: the computer that terminates the data

CN.question: Communication channel is shared by all the machines on the network in ________
